supplier_of: agriculture - import-export | peanuts | argentine meat | honey | walnuts
information: PMP Trade is a company that specializes in import and export of agricultural products from South America and Europe. Some of the company's founders are from South America and our main office is in Paris. This combination allows us to open new markets and have a create a strong link between Europe and South America. We have also commercial representations in other south Korea and other European countries such as Germany, the Netherlands and Spain among others. We have our own production places in Argentina and we rely on trustful and commitment suppliers from Chile, Brazil and Uruguay which makes us capable of offering the highest quality at a competitive price. Our years of experience allows us to provide a extensive range of products such as honey, corn, soy, cow meat, pork meat, walnuts and peanuts among others. In addition, we are starting our production branch in Europe which focus on French cheese and Spanish ham. We are always looking for new business opportunities. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any question. We have many products to offer.
keywords: Agriculture - import-export, peanuts, argentine meat, honey, walnuts
